title: Former Bachelor star Jessica Brody flaunts gangster 'thug wife' tattoo
text:
Former Bachelor star Jessica Brody has shown off her gangster tattoos on Instagram.

The brunette bombshell, who boasts an impressive 270,000 followers, stripped down to a bra and sweatpants to flaunt her impressive ink.

Among the 31-year-old's tattoos were the words 'thug wife' etched in the middle of her stomach.

Gangster! Former Bachelor star Jessica Brody showed off her 'thug wife' tattoo on Instagram

Jessica's edgy post comes just one week after she publicly came out as bisexual.

The tattooed model and makeup artist opened up about her sexuality in an Instagram Q&A with her fans last Saturday.

When asked if she'd ever date another woman, the stunner said: 'If I met someone that I liked then that's someone I like... I have no preference with gender.'

'I've dated both men and women before': The former Bachelor star publicly came out as bisexual last Saturday

She continued: 'Whoever I like I like. I've dated both men and women before.'

The bombshell also revealed the surprising reason why she no longer updates her account regularly.

'The reason I don't much is because it's really important to prioritise my happiness in real life over my "happiness" on social media,' she said.

When asked if she'd ever consider dating another woman, the 31-year-old said: 'If I met someone that I liked then that's someone I like... I have no preference with gender'

'I'm focusing on real life,' she continued. 'It's really important to me to concentrate on what's really going on in my life, and then social media is secondary.'

Jessica appeared on the most recent season of The Bachelor as an intruder, and was previously romantically linked to The Project's Tommy Little.

She's the latest in a growing list of Bachelor stars to open up about their sexuality publicly in recent years.

Trailblazers: Megan Marx was the first Bachelor star to come out as bisexual, with the blonde enjoying a highly publicised relationship with her former co-star Tiffany Scanlon

Kiss: Alex Nation and Brooke Blurton had a brief fling on Bachelor In Paradise this year

Megan Marx was the first, with the Bachelor In Paradise star enjoying a highly publicised relationship with her former co-star Tiffany Scanlon before they split in 2017.

Alex Nation also had a relationship with a woman after splitting from former Bachelor Richie Strahan, before enjoying a brief fling with Brooke Blurton on Bachelor In Paradise.

On the American version of the popular franchise, Demi Burnett found love with Christian minister Kristian Haggerty, with the pair officially getting engaged on the Bachelor In Paradise finale.
description: Former Bachelor star Jessica Brody has shown off her gangster tattoos on Instagram.
